verbose_text: It was shown that : (i) LetA specifically binds upstream of rsmY and rsmZ and that the LetA / LetS TCS controls their expression; (ii) expression of rsmY and rsmZ in E. coli results in a similar phenotype as over-expression of csrB and csrC and; (iii) RsmY and RsmZ bind CsrA, confirming that RsmY and RsmZ are the missing link in the LetA / S-CsrA regulatory pathway.
